S:log-item.D:comment:
CASSANDRA-296 fix grammar breakage
Changeset ada820 was an attempt to make hostname parsing less stupid, (i.e. don't allow underscores; do allow hyphens; allow IP addresses). It didn't entirely fix the problems it set out to and it broke parsing of anything that used the "Identifier" lexer, (for example the thrift {get,set} ... commands).
This changeset partially reverts ada820 until a proper fix to hostname parsing can be found.
